title: Chop Shop Operation - Warehouse District
description: Suspected illegal vehicle dismantling operation. Anonymous tip led to surveillance of warehouse. Possible connection to vehicle theft ring.

persons.name: Victor Kozlov
persons.description: Owner of 'VK Auto Parts'. Prior arrests for receiving stolen property.

persons.name: Anonymous Tipster
persons.statement: Cars go in at night, parts come out in the morning. Been going on for months.

persons.name: Danny 'Wheels' Morrison
persons.description: Known associate of Kozlov. Suspected driver for theft operations.

evidence.description: Business registration for VK Auto Parts
